name: Game Boy Platformer Asset Pack (11 Tile sets!)
name_original: Game Boy Platformer Asset Pack (11 Tile sets!)
description:
A FREE collection of Platformer Environment Background Asset Packs for use with Game Boy Game Development. All designed specifically with high readability for the Game Boy and ease of use, these packs can be mixed and matched together to create ever more unique environments, enabling you to easily start making Game Boy games using software such as GB Studio or GBDK!

  • "BEACH" themed tile-set
  • "CASTLE" themed tile-set
  • "CAVE" themed tile-set
  • "CONSTRUCTION SITE" themed tile-se
  • "DESERT" themed tile-set
  • "FOREST" themed tile-set
  • "TOWN" themed tile-set
  • "GRASSLAND" themed tile-set
  • "SCI-FI" themed tile-set
  • "SNOW" themed tile-set
  • "UNDERWATER" themed tile-set
  • Tile-sets are setup for either 8x8 or 16x16 pixel tile implementation.
  • PNG tile-set uses 4 color/tone Game Boy Palette (GB Studio Color Palette).
  • Includes an Example PNG file to give you an idea of what can be achieved with the tile-set.
  • Use GB Studio's color mode to create palettes and paint your scenes in any way that suits your own project!
  • For GBDK users, pack includes a GBTD file as well as an example GBMB map to make it even easier for you to jump straight in!
  • Grayscale PNG tile-set included enabling easy editing of GBTD file.

Credit is not necessary but greatly appreciated! Suggested credit: "Background Assets by Gumpy Function (gumpyfunction.itch.io)"

If you want to support me you can donate or rate my other games, check 'em out here!

Follow me on Twitter to stay up to date with all my Game Boy work!

-Licensing-

Assets can be used in non-commercial and commercial projects of any kind, excluding those relating to or containing non-fungible tokens (NFT) or blockchain related projects. Assets can be edited to suit your own needs. Asset packs are not to be redistributed.
